price: vjesnik radosnih vijesti i opomena – pa opet većina njih glavu okreće, neće ni da čuje.
arabic: بَشِيرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا فَأَعۡرَضَ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: bashīran wanadhīran fa-aʿraḍa aktharuhum fahum lā yasmaʿūna
